Here is the list of signs at $line with their corresponding scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Balanced fire sign, but can be impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Earthy and practical, but also stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, but can be flighty and unpredictable.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Emotional and nurturing, but can be moody and overly attached.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can be prideful and dominating.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but can be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and social, but can be indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and perceptive, but can be intense and controlling.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but can be reckless and blunt.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Disciplined and ambitious, but can be rigid and cynical.
11. Aquarius - 7/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but can be rebellious and unpredictable.
12. Pisces - 5/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, but can be dreamy and overly sensitive.
Please note that these scores are subjective and based on general astrological profiles.
